title: Tranquil Bhubaneswar Five-Star Garden Oasis with Stunning Pool, Onsite Restaurant & Tennis Court
description: Discover unparalleled serenity with a generous touch of luxury in the bustling heart of India's Temple City, Bhubaneswar. Ensconced amid lush manicured gardens and fruit orchards and adorned with rich artefacts, the urban sanctuary boasts elegant rooms and offers a gateway to the city's vibrant spiritual history. Relish authentic Odia and international cuisine at the onsite restaurant, serve it up at the tennis courts or take a refreshing dip in the pool. If you wish to venture out, the temples of Lingaraj and Bramheswara and the ancient Sisupalgarh Fort await exploration.
